name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: This pumpkin spice latte is the perfect treat for a chilly fall day. It's super creamy, vegan, and it's great to cosy up when the weather gets colder. And it comes together in only 5 minutes!

recipeInstructions.text: Froth up the almond milk either with an espresso machine or an electric milk frother. Add the frothed milk together with the remaining ingredients to a small pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Froth up the almond milk either with an espresso machine or an electric milk frother. Add the frothed milk together with the remaining ingredients to a small pot.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir with a whisk until well combined. Heat it to your preferred temperature on the stove top.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir with a whisk until well combined. Heat it to your preferred temperature on the stove top.
